name: Emilia
description: Fit perfectly! I am a skater, these 3 wheels inline skate are suitable for me, even though there is no brake. And it is easy to stop and easy to use. I would recommend it to my classmates.

name: Mueller
description: My Son loved these! Good quality and functionable!

name: Rowland
description: Bought this for my 11 yo daughter, who is entering word of speed skating. They are easy to put on and helped her improve her speed

name: Lucia
description: Padding kept my feet comfortable and I use it often. Worth the price

name: Elvia
description: I have been using these 3 wheel inline skates from past month. These are very frictionless and they pick up the speed so fast as well as their braking capability is good.

name: Kelley
description: I got these to keep up with my kid on his electric scooter. glad I went with blades that had larger wheels, just feels so much smoother on a paved road than smaller wheels or my skateboard.
